sentence.Network_en: George rattled on with a volubility which surprised himself.
sentence.Network_cn: 乔治滔滔不绝地说话,连他自己听了也觉得诧异.

sentence.Network_en: This sharp vivacity of soul , and the supple and restless volubility attending it, disturb our negotiations.
sentence.Network_cn: 才思太过敏捷, 锋芒过于显露, 是人与人之间沟通交流的一大障碍.

sentence.Network_en: Have money all volubility, wait for me to scoop up enough I fall again.
sentence.Network_cn: 有钱全都好说话, 等我捞够了我再下.

list.abs: Her explanations for failure to do the work were voluble but not easily believed., 他对工作失误的辩解是流利的 , 但难以令人相信.
volubility中文 ... - eloquence volubility 谈锋 - with volubility 滔滔不绝地 - Excessive volubility 多言癖，妄辩.
Self - esteem is the most voluble of the emotions ., 自尊心是最无常的感情.
she is an extremely voluble young woman who engages in soliloquies not conversations ., 这位少妇非常健谈 , 以致于她可以沉浸在自言自语中而不需要交谈者.

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being facile in speech and writing

stems_affixes.word_buile: evolution[n.进化,演变,发展,进展]+ism学术流派→n.进化论 adj.进化论的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 爱说话的, 有口才的, 流利的, 健谈的, [罕]易旋转的, 缠绕的

stems_affixes.word_buile: volume卷,册+inous多……的→多卷[册]的→长篇的
evolu=evolve[v.[使]发展;[使]进化;[使]进展]+tion表名词→n.进化,演变,发展,进展
evolution[n.进化,演变,发展,进展]+ism学术流派→n.进化论 adj.进化论的
re回,翻+volu转,卷+tion表名词→转翻→革命
volu转,卷+me→卷→一卷书[古时的书籍成卷形]
volu转,卷+te→n. 涡形;螺旋形;涡螺壳
